data.title: Driscoll Children's Hospital
data.meta_site_name: Driscoll Children's Hospital - Together, we heal.
data.text:
When

June 10-13, 2024

A parent education session and a camp celebration are held on the last day of camp. More information will be available when your child is registered. Dismissal takes place after the parent education session on Thursday. Parents must attend registration and education sessionsâ€”no exceptions.

All campers must have their own transportation to and from camp.

Who

Where

Camp Easy Breathers will be held at Camp Aranzazu, 5420 FM 1781, Rockport, Texas 78382, six miles from downtown Rockport.

How to Apply

Campers are encouraged to submit their applications early due to limited space. Eligibility for selection to attend Camp Easy Breathers depends upon completion of all forms, releases and other requirements explained in the application packet. Please refer to the Pre-Camp Guide for more information.

Limited space and scholarships are available. We will accept the first 30 eligible applicants who submit their complete application and required forms.

Cost

There is no charge to the families or volunteers to attend camp. Driscoll summer camp is made possible for your child through generous gifts from amazing individuals, organizations, foundations and corporations!

The camp includes all meals, snacks and activities.

About Camp Aranzazu

There is no charge to the families or volunteers to attend camp. Driscoll summer camp is made possible for your child through generous gifts from amazing individuals, organizations, foundations and corporations!
